column4: Have two natty laptops that I'm trying to make communicate so I can transfer some data over. One is running off of a LiveUSB with the Sharing service installed (both have sharing) and they don't see each other
ZIt'll be Battery Notifier

Have two natty laptops that I'm trying to make communicate so I can transfer some data over. One is running off of a LiveUSB with the Sharing service installed (both have sharing) and they don't see each other.
What does it do Peer?
Does the logitech device start halting?
Your on LTS, so your running Gnome2
So just right click
And it'll be there
Add to Panel btw
first it is really slow and then I got the message that I must send a notification... then that my notification is already sent..
it's already in the panel...
it's basically a power management tool
I don't know... I'm a n00b again since I've installed ubuntu... I know 3 Windows OS on my fingers but now I feel like learning all of it again... lol
try opening grub on your next boot and add "acpi=off noapic nolapic" in your boot parameters behind "--quiet-splash"
hum.. i'm afraid you will have to write me a step by step :S... if you're up to it..
oh jeez. OK GRUB is Ubuntu's boot manager. When your booting your PC hit and hold SHIFT and it will open GRUB (this is before the ubuntu loading screen pops up)
ok that will help me, thx :)
you seems good, i took notes... are you here for a moment?
email me, got company coming over
it half-helped
what didn't work?
logitech do not crash anymore.. but it does not install or uninstall anything...
